CustomField.description: Number of articles to display on the ContactUs search results. Should not be set to more than 10-15 to ensure a visually manageable number of results per page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of articles to display on the ContactUs search results. Should not be set to more than 10-15 to ensure a visually manageable number of results per page.
CustomField.label: Contact Results Page Size
